title: When will Hextech Crafting & Looting going to come out in OCE?
body: It's already out in NA but when will it be out in OCE?

replies.body: Yeah it should be soon since it just came out in EUNE and EUW.
Hopefully by the end of the week :D If not, probably sometime next week.

Unrelated to the post- but I couldn't help but notice the title "Instructor" on your boards profile.
I'm curious what this implies, as I've not seen it before.

Instructors are part of the volunteer program for the boards :)

Instructors: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/RaWrI4Hi-introducing-the-instructors
Emissaries: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Edu7E6Bp-introducing-the-emissaries
Wrenchmen: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/nE4lj5EB-introducing-the-wrenchmen
Guessing Thursday or Friday for us
